snippet: Hank Ratner, who was also the chief executive of Madison Square Garden, is now its vice chairman, and Tad Smith, the president of local media for Cablevision, has succeeded him.
abstract: Hank Ratner, public face of Madison Square Garden's $1 billion renovation, is replaced as president and chief executive of the Madison Square Garden Company by Cablevision executive Tad Smith; Ratner will continue as vice chairman of company's board.
lead_paragraph: Hank Ratner, who was also the chief executive of Madison Square Garden, is now its vice chairman, and Tad Smith, the president of local media for Cablevision, has succeeded him.

headline.main: President of the Garden Is Replaced by an Executive at Cablevision
headline.print_headline: President of the Garden Is Replaced by an Executive at Cablevision
